title: pironmind
author: pironmind
content: Hi, Bitcoiners  ₿₿₿What are we doing?All about web3 like: Smart Contracts, DAPP, and even cool designProposition:- DAPP development from Desing to Deploy your application.- Smart contract architecture and development including DeFi protocols, NFT, NFT marketplaces, and any ERC tokens (ERC20).- Backend services like crypto wallets, parsers, trading and chatbots, and admin panels.- Making you MVP with us- Also we providing consulting for web3 solution, and web2 to web3 transfer.We work with Ethereum, Tron, Avalanche, Polygon, Solana, Stacks, etc.Happy to see and to talk with you in PM.We DON'T work with:- Dating- Gambling- AdultAny proposition and consults via telegram (pm)Telegram: @pironmindOr visit our websiteWebsite: www.pironmind.com/
